SQL_STMT_U.val: select k.eacc_account_nr from :1 rpp, :2 p, :3 k, :7 rs where rpp.rpp_relatienummer = ~4 and rpp.rpp_relatienummer = p.pcac_relationnr and rpp.rpp_productnummer = ~5 and rpp.rpp_volgnr_per_product = ~6 and rpp.rpp_productnummer = p.pcac_productnr and rpp.rpp_volgnr_per_product = p.pcac_productseqnr and p.pcac_standard_ind = 1 and p.pcac_exac_id = k.eacc_exac_id and rpp.rpp_rekeningsoort = rs.rs_soort and rs.rs_type_rekening <> 1 and rownum <= 1
